item.title: PyramidDrop: Accelerating Your Large Vision-Language Models via Pyramid Visual Redundancy Reduction
item.description: PyramidDrop enhances large vision-language models by selectively dropping redundant visual tokens in deeper layers to accelerate training and inference without sacrificing performance.
